    • Method Detail

      • isJoinedService

        public boolean isJoinedService()
        Description copied from interface: IHA2PhaseCommitMessage
        true iff the service was recognized as being joined with the met quorum at the time that the prepare message was prepared.

        Note: This is used to support atomic decisions about whether or not a service was joined with the met quorum at the time that the leader decided to commit. Services that are in the pipeline and resynchronizing will either be joined or not for the purposes of a given 2-phase commit based on this flag.

        Specified by:
        isJoinedService in interface IHA2PhaseCommitMessage

      • getCommitTime

        public long getCommitTime()
        Description copied from interface: IHA2PhaseCommitMessage
        The commit time that will be assigned to the new commit point.
        Specified by:
        getCommitTime in interface IHA2PhaseCommitMessage

      • didAllServicesPrepare

        public boolean didAllServicesPrepare()
        Description copied from interface: IHA2PhaseCommitMessage
        Return true iff all services voted "YES" for PREPARE. When false, not all services will participate in this commit (but the commit will still be performed).
        Specified by:
        didAllServicesPrepare in interface IHA2PhaseCommitMessage

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • failCommit_beforeWritingRootBlockOnJournal

        public boolean failCommit_beforeWritingRootBlockOnJournal()
        Description copied from interface: IHA2PhaseCommitMessage
        When true the COMMIT message will fail within the commit2Phase implementation. An exception will be thrown immeditely before the new root block is written onto the journal.

        Note: This is for unit tests only.

        Specified by:
        failCommit_beforeWritingRootBlockOnJournal in interface IHA2PhaseCommitMessage

      • failCommit_beforeClosingHALog

        public boolean failCommit_beforeClosingHALog()
        Description copied from interface: IHA2PhaseCommitMessage
        When true the COMMIT message will fail within the commit2Phase implementation. An exception will be thrown immeditely before the closing root block is written onto the HALog file.

        Note: This is for unit tests only.

        Specified by:
        failCommit_beforeClosingHALog in interface IHA2PhaseCommitMessage
